about_the_game:
A new case, “Two Bad Sisters”, from writer Jon Ingold (Overboard!, A Highland Song, 80 Days), is coming soon!

A visiting gentlewoman, Sara Estelle, has left a rare and valuable stamp in the care of Father Ezekiel. It ain't there now. The Father says she collected it - but Sara was in the saloon all night, losing at cards. Is Ezekiel lying? Or is there more to this case than meets the eye?

short_description: From the writer of “Overboard!”, Jon Ingold - Miss Sara Estelle has arrived in Brimstone, and she needs your help tracking down a valuable possession left in the care of the priest. There’s only one problem: the priest swears she already came and collected it herself!
